instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: <SIGNAL>820_3115</SIGNAL>-b no video,chime but  Fan spin
threads.message:
So i have this board that doesn't boot up, fan spins and i have cpu vcore, i tried plugging in usb mouse,
but it doesn't light up and pch is getting hot.
i have rtc voltage and its 3.3ish, so what next??

threads.title: <SIGNAL>820_3115</SIGNAL>-b no video,chime but  Fan spin
threads.message:
Do you note a drop of VCORE, in respect of start value?
Try new BIOS, witch clean ME if possible.
